website_summaries.verdict: This velvety moisturizer with mineral-rich peat extract uses 80 herbs for anti-aging.
pros: The cream is thick and plumping and showed marked improvement on lines, uneven texture, and dark spots after just two weeks of use
It helps with increasing elasticity and brightens up skin tone
cons: It does come at a high price point though

customer_reviews.title: I love this item. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Im starting to love this. my skin has been so much better since I started using this. This makes my skin so moisturized and wet. Mu skin has been getting wrinkly and this is helping me amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Khaliunaatar Nominchuluun

customer_reviews.title: Has improved my skin texture
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure what's in the cream but all I can say it has dramatically improved my skin texture. I have noticed that my dark spots especially around my chin area have been lightly disappearing. My face looks way more moisturized and bouncy. I have been using the cream for a month now and using sunscreen during the day. It will leave you looking really oily but honestly it's worth it. I use it in the morning and when it's absorbed in I'll use a sunscreen (At night I'll put an eye cream and use the Belif too). Overall, I am beyond happy with this cream it's improved my texture beyond my expectations 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingBeans

customer_reviews.title: Possibly good for inflammatory conditions
customer_reviews.text: Peat extract is a product of decayed organic matter. It was discovered that two of the major profits of this process, humic acid and fulvic acid, have anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, antifungal and antiviral properties. Since this medical discovery, peat extract is becoming more popular for use skin cosmetics. This has a pleasant, light fragrance. Here’s a picture of what the cream looks like in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coral

customer_reviews.title: not sure what it does, it's not fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: maybe it is doing something, maybe it's not. i just keep using it because of what it says it does. the only thing i wish they do is not put fragrance because it is an eye cream. dermatologist that i follow said fragrances shouldn't be present in a skin care product that touches the eye area. i still use it. it has a pleasant smell, but i just wish it is fragrance free. it looks the same as the face cream and smells the same as the face cream in this line, so not sure if it is the same cream in a different label.
customer_reviews.author: JijieF

customer_reviews.title: Rich, Creamy, Light and Smooth!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the consistency of this luxurious cream!! The ingredients are a long list of the bizarre and the unusual, but it all seems to work together to make a truly rich light creamy heavenly smooth facial moisturizer that Hydrates and improves my skin!! After just a few days I can see and feel a great difference!! Love the feeling!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: BaliDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great facial product for men, with minimal scent and no residual shiny, sticky, or oily feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Although expensive, a little goes a long way...I've used this for several weeks using just the cream that adheres to the plastic liner inside the cap. The cream works particularly well following a serum, which doesn't have to be in the same product line. It is quickly absorbed, leaving your face well moisturized but neither shiny nor greasy or oily. Great for men. Pleasant and mild scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Stuart Gitlow

customer_reviews.title: Now a favorite
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome moisturizer. It's extra-thick and hydrating without being super oily like some creams are. It's even great on my combination-type skin. No issues with irritation or breakout. I'm new to this line/brand and it's easily become a favorite!
customer_reviews.author: This is me

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Light
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely scent. This light cream smooths on beautifully. I use it before I put my makeup on just before I put my Belif eye cream (my favorite Belif product) on. No, it doesn't make me look years younger, but it does make my skin more supple looking. I am not sure about the peat part of the product. That's odd, but I don't see any in there. I don't think I would like that.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Thick moisturizer for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This is everything that I've needed in a nighttime moisturizer, its thick and creamy so you'll only need a small amount to cover your face. When I wakeup in the morning, my skin is left feeling super soft and moisturized. After a month of use, my skin does feel much better and isn't as dry throughout the day now.
customer_reviews.author: TheMysteriousLibra

customer_reviews.title: Thick, rich and smells divine
customer_reviews.text: I have quite the collection of face creams (I've been reviewing quite a few lately), but this one is the one I use the most. It is thick, smooth and rich, smells divine and absorbs very well. A little quantity of it goes a long way and it does a great job of hydrating my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mido

customer_reviews.title: belif Peat Miracle Revital Cream
customer_reviews.text: This belif Peat Miracle Revital Cream is a nice cream that is moisturizing without being heavy or greasy. It has a nice scent that is not overwhelming. It has not caused any breakouts or irritation to my skin. I have not seen an improvement in my skin texture or appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Super Nintendo

customer_reviews.title: It's light and heavy at the same time
customer_reviews.text: Once applied it felt really tacky but it dried completely within 3 minutes. Didn't feel like film was on my face. It absorbs deep and helps me with my oily skin. It sits really well under my heavy SPF. My sensitive skin definitely approves this cream.
customer_reviews.author: It works!

customer_reviews.title: Great cream
customer_reviews.text: This is not just a regular moisturizer but has plenty of nutrients to give you an extra boost. All of the belif products I've tried so far has left my skin feeling fresh and retaining plenty of moisture. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, velvety face cream. Feels a little heavy for day use, but it’s perfect as a night cream. In the mornings, my face feels baby soft. There’s a light peony/rose scent that I really enjoy and appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mynxxie

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement after first use and then plateaus. Would be good before a wedding or big weekend. Feels nice and no issues with sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi R

product_meta.title: | belif Peat Miracle Revital Cream | Anti-Aging Face Cream for Elasticity |
product_meta.description:
This rich, velvety-smooth moisturizer is formulated with mineral-rich peat extract to provide hydration and support antiaging. The extract has a rare blend of over 80 different herbs that effectively promote natural skin turnover while improving the look of the skin’s elasticity for smoother, younger-looking skin.

BRAND STORY
The undisputed authority in hydration. belif combines time-trusted apothecary herbs and modern skin science to create effective skincare solutions
